conversation.content: So basically I just... noticed this charge. Again.
Oh! Um, okay so. Let me. Er, pull that up. Just need your account number or, uh, email?
It's like, basically I set this up and then, so... completely forgot.
No worries! That's, um, totally normal actually, so, uh, happens all the time. What email did you, er, use for the account?
j.martinez at gmail.
Perfect. Got it. Um, so I'm seeing here, uh, account ID ACC-7829-MX91. Is that, er, for the premium subscription that started, hmm, back in August?
Yeah. So basically like, I don't even use it anymore.
Completely understand! So, um, that's. That's frustrating. Let me just, uh, check here. Transaction TXN-445821-QR shows, er, three months of charges at $29.99?
Three months? Do you know how embarrassing this is?
Hey. It's okay. Really. Um, so like, this happens more than you'd think, and uh, we can definitely. We can fix this.
Just cancel it.
Absolutely. Canceling now. Done. Um, and so, I'm also seeing here that, er, we can issue a partial refund? For last month's charge under policy POL-8847-C?
You can refund it? Even though it's like, basically my fault?
Um, yes! So basically, uh, since you haven't logged in, er, for over 30 days according to, hmm, let me see... report RPT-2901-K. We can refund October.
I'm platinum member. Should get all three months back.
Oh! Platinum. Let me. Um, so checking your status here, member ID MEM-55492-PL and, uh, you're right. Different policy applies.
So like, basically what happens now?
So, um, processing full refund. All three months. Er, confirmation number is, uh, REF-78823-PLT and you'll see that in, hmm, 3-5 business days.
That's it? Done?
All done! Um, sent confirmation to your email. Receipt RCP-90127-X attached. And, uh, again? Don't feel bad. Happens constantly. You're all set.
